verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came בַּיָּמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> bai-ya-Mim And it came to pass in those days הָהֵ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> ha-Hem, those וַיִּקְבְּצ֨וּ <S%H6908><s%> vai-yik-be-Tzu together פְלִשְׁתִּ֤ים <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim that the Philistines אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מַֽחֲנֵיהֶם֙ <S%H4264><s%> ma-cha-nei-Hem their armies לַצָּבָ֔א <S%H6635><s%> latz-tza-Va, for warfare לְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <S%H3898><s%> le-hil-la-Chem to fight בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> be-Yis-ra-'El; with Israel וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אָכִישׁ֙ <S%H397><s%> 'a-Chish And Achish אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, unto David יָדֹ֣עַ <S%H3045><s%> ya-Do-a' Know תֵּדַ֗ע <S%H3045><s%> te-Da', thou assuredly כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִתִּי֙ <S%H854><s%> 'it-Ti that תֵּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> te-Tze that thou shalt go out בַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <S%H4264><s%> vam-ma-cha-Neh, with me to battle אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you וַאֲנָשֶֽׁיךָ׃ <S%H376><s%> va-'a-na-Shei-cha. and your men

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid And David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אָכִ֔ישׁ <S%H397><s%> 'a-Chish, to Achish לָכֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen Surely אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you תֵדַ֔ע <S%H3045><s%> te-Da', thou shalt know אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- what יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Seh can do עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5650><s%> 'av-De-cha; what thy servant וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אָכִישׁ֙ <S%H397><s%> 'a-Chish And Achish אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, to David לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen, well שֹׁמֵ֧ר <S%H8104><s%> sho-Mer thee keeper לְרֹאשִׁ֛י <S%H7218><s%> le-ro-Shi of mine head אֲשִֽׂימְךָ֖ <S%H7760><s%> 'a-si-me-Cha Therefore will I make כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- for הַיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> hai-ya-Mim. for ever פ Peh

וּשְׁמוּאֵ֣ל <S%H8050><s%> u-she-mu-'El Now Samuel מֵ֔ת <S%H4191><s%> Met, was dead וַיִּסְפְּדוּ־ <S%H5594><s%> vai-yis-pe-du- had lamented לוֹ֙ lo כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, and all Israel וַיִּקְבְּרֻ֥הוּ <S%H6912><s%> vai-yik-be-Ru-hu him and buried בָרָמָ֖ה <S%H7414><s%> va-ra-Mah him in Ramah וּבְעִיר֑וֹ <S%H5892><s%> u-ve-'i-Ro; even in his own city וְשָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> ve-sha-'Ul, And Saul הֵסִ֛יר <S%H5493><s%> he-Sir had put away הָאֹב֥וֹת <S%H178><s%> ha-'o-Vot those that had familiar spirits וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַיִּדְּעֹנִ֖ים <S%H3049><s%> hai-yid-de-'o-Nim and the wizards מֵהָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> me-ha-'A-retz. out of the land

וַיִּקָּבְצ֣וּ <S%H6908><s%> vai-yik-ka-ve-Tzu gathered themselves together פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim, And the Philistines וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u and came וַיַּחֲנ֣וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְשׁוּנֵ֑ם <S%H7766><s%> ve-shu-Nem; in Shunem וַיִּקְבֹּ֤ץ <S%H6908><s%> vai-yik-Botz together שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul and Saul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, all Israel וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and they pitched בַּגִּלְבֹּֽעַ׃ <S%H1533><s%> bag-gil-Bo-a'. in Gilboa

וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar saw שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul And when Saul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> ma-cha-Neh the host פְלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim; of the Philistines וַיִּרָ֕א <S%H3372><s%> vai-yi-Ra he was afraid וַיֶּחֱרַ֥ד <S%H2729><s%> vai-ye-che-Rad trembled לִבּ֖וֹ <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bo and his heart מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od. greatly

וַיִּשְׁאַ֤ל <S%H7592><s%> vai-yish-'Al enquired שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul And when Saul בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo did not עָנָ֖הוּ <S%H6030><s%> 'a-Na-hu answered יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD גַּ֧ם <S%H1571><s%> gam either בַּחֲלֹמ֛וֹת <S%H2472><s%> ba-cha-lo-Mot him not neither by dreams גַּ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> gam or בָּאוּרִ֖ים <S%H224><s%> ba-'u-Rim nor by Urim גַּ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> gam or בַּנְּבִיאִֽם׃ <S%H5030><s%> ban-ne-vi-'Im. nor by prophets

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer Then said שָׁא֜וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul Saul לַעֲבָדָ֗יו <S%H5650><s%> la-'a-va-Dav, unto his servants בַּקְּשׁוּ־ <S%H1245><s%> bak-ke-shu- Seek לִי֙ li אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> 'E-shet me a woman בַּעֲלַת־ <S%H1172><s%> ba-'a-lat- that hath א֔וֹב <S%H178><s%> ov, a familiar spirit וְאֵלְכָ֥ה <S%H1980><s%> ve-'e-le-Chah may go אֵלֶ֖יהָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-ha about וְאֶדְרְשָׁה־ <S%H1875><s%> ve-'ed-re-shah- to her and enquire בָּ֑הּ Bah; וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru said עֲבָדָיו֙ <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dav of her And his servants אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, to him הִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold אֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> 'E-shet to him Behold [there is] a woman בַּֽעֲלַת־ <S%H1172><s%> ba-'a-lat- that hath א֖וֹב <S%H178><s%> ov a familiar spirit בְּעֵ֥ין be-'Ein דּֽוֹר׃ <S%H5874><s%> Dor. at Endor

וַיִּתְחַפֵּ֣שׂ <S%H2664><s%> vai-yit-chap-Pes disguised שָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul, And Saul וַיִּלְבַּשׁ֙ <S%H3847><s%> vai-yil-Bash himself and put on בְּגָדִ֣ים <S%H899><s%> be-ga-Dim raiment אֲחֵרִ֔ים <S%H312><s%> 'a-che-Rim, other וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech and went ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu, he וּשְׁנֵ֤י <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Nei and two אֲנָשִׁים֙ <S%H582><s%> 'a-na-Shim men עִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> im-Mo, and they וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u with him and they came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah to the woman לָ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> La-ye-lah; by night וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, and he said; קָסֹומִי־ ka-so-mi- כקָֽסֳמִי־ <S%H7080><s%> ko-so-mi- Conjure נָ֥א <S%H7080><s%> na I pray thee divine קלִי֙ li בָּא֔וֹב <S%H178><s%> ba-'ov, unto me by the familiar spirit וְהַ֣עֲלִי <S%H5927><s%> ve-Ha-'a-li and bring me [him] up לִ֔י Li, אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- whom אֹמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> 'o-Mar whom I shall name אֵלָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H413><s%> 'e-La-yich. about

וַתֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer said הָֽאִשָּׁ֜ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah And the woman אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, to him הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you יָדַ֙עְתָּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ta unto him Behold thou knowest אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- what עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah hath done שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul, what Saul אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher how הִכְרִ֛ית <S%H3772><s%> hich-Rit how he hath cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאֹב֥וֹת <S%H178><s%> ha-'o-Vot those that have familiar spirits וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַיִּדְּעֹנִ֖י <S%H3049><s%> hai-yid-de-'o-Ni and the wizards מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; out of the land וְלָמָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> ve-la-Mah Why אַתָּ֛ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you מִתְנַקֵּ֥שׁ <S%H5367><s%> mit-nak-Kesh wherefore then layest thou a snare בְּנַפְשִׁ֖י <S%H5315><s%> be-naf-Shi for my life לַהֲמִיתֵֽנִי׃ <S%H4191><s%> la-ha-mi-Te-ni. to cause me to die

וַיִּשָּׁ֤בַֽע <S%H7650><s%> vai-yish-Sha-va' sware לָהּ֙ lah שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul, And Saul בַּֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh to her by the LORD לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> chai- liveth יְהוָ֕ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [As] the LORD אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- there shall יִקְּרֵ֥ךְ <S%H7136><s%> yik-ke-Rech happen עָוֹ֖ן <S%H5771><s%> 'a-Von no punishment בַּדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> bad-da-Var to thee for this thing הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. this

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer Then said הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah, the woman אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִ֖י <S%H4310><s%> mi Whom אַֽעֲלֶה־ <S%H5927><s%> 'a-'a-leh- Whom shall I bring up לָּ֑ךְ Lach; וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer unto thee;And he said אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <S%H8050><s%> she-mu-'El Samuel הַֽעֲלִי־ <S%H5927><s%> ha-'a-li- Bring me up לִֽי׃ Li.

וַתֵּ֤רֶא <S%H7200><s%> vat-Te-re saw הָֽאִשָּׁה֙ <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah And when the woman אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <S%H8050><s%> she-mu-'El, Samuel וַתִּזְעַ֖ק <S%H2199><s%> vat-tiz-'Ak she cried בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> be-Kol voice גָּד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol; with a loud וַתֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> vat-to-Mer spake הָאִשָּׁ֨ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah and the woman אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to שָׁא֧וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul to Saul לֵאמֹ֛ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor saying לָ֥מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Lam-mah Why רִמִּיתָ֖נִי <S%H7411><s%> rim-mi-Ta-ni Why hast thou deceived וְאַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah you שָׁאֽוּל׃ <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul. me;for thou [art] Saul

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said לָ֥הּ lah הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech And the king אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּֽירְאִ֖י <S%H3372><s%> tir-'I unto her Be not afraid כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki but מָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> mah what רָאִ֑ית <S%H7200><s%> ra-'It; for what sawest וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer said הָֽאִשָּׁה֙ <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah thou;And the woman אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul, unto Saul אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him gods רָאִ֖יתִי <S%H7200><s%> ra-'I-ti I saw עֹלִ֥ים <S%H5927><s%> 'o-Lim ascending מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- out הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. out of the earth
